definitions.definition: A boat especially designed for saving the lives of shipwrecked people or people in distress at sea (either launched from the shore with a crew, or else carried on board a larger ship).
An emergency vehicle carried aboard a spaceship .

main_definition: ( nautical ) A boat especially designed for saving the lives of shipwrecked people or people in distress at sea (either launched from the shore with a crew, or else carried on board a larger ship).
secondary_definitions: ( science fiction ) An emergency vehicle carried aboard a spaceship .
